name: Thermal Comfort in Sight
description: Apply SVI for thermal comfort assessment in Singapore.
author: Yang et al.
huggingfaceDataset: Dataset can be applied directly: sijiey/Thermal-Affordance-Dataset

config.title: Urban Streetscape Perception Survey
config.description: Hello! Here at the Urban Analytics Lab at the National University of Singapore, we are currently conducting an online perception survey that will take approximately 15 minutes to complete and consists of around 50 questions regarding photos taken at the street-level. Such a survey will help us understand what drives people’s perception and how to design spaces that are visually appealing. Throughout the survey, participants’ main task is to select the most suitable street view image among multiple images based on certain dimensions and personal impressions. As a token of appreciation, participants who successfully complete the full survey will receive a compensation fee of SGD 5.

pages.name: demographics
pages.title: Part 1: Streetscape Comfort Perception
pages.description: Please choose the image which you find to have the most comfortable streetscape.

elements.name: comfort_intro
elements.title: Among the provided street view images, which place do you perceive to be the most comfortable?
elements.description: You need to pick one image in each question.

elements.name: comfort
elements.title: Comfort
elements.description: choose the most comfortable one.

pages.name: page_1760605955437
pages.title: Part 2: Streetscape Thermal Comfort (Heat Comfort) Perception
pages.description: Please choose the image in which you think to have the best thermal comfort (heat comfort).

elements.name: thermal_comfort_intro
elements.title: Among the provided street view images, which place do you perceive to have the best thermal comfort (heat comfort) ?
elements.description: You need to pick one image in each set.

elements.name: thermal_comfort
elements.title: Thermal_Comfort
elements.description: choose the most thermal (heat) -comfortable one.

pages.name: page_1760605955438
pages.title: Part 3: Streetscape Environment Perception
pages.description: Please choose the image in which you think to exhibit the following environmental parameters most, there are nine parameters in this section.

elements.name: environment_intro
elements.title: Among the provided street view images, which place do you perceive to exhibit the following environmental parameters most?
elements.description: There are nine parameters in total, and you need to pick one image for each parameter.

elements.name: temperature
elements.title: Temperature
elements.description: choose the one with highest temperature.

elements.name: sunlight_intensity
elements.title: Sunlight Intensity
elements.description: choose the one with highest sunlight intensity.

elements.name: artificial_heat_sources
elements.title: Artificial Heat Sources
elements.description: choose the one with most artificial heat sources (building, car...).

elements.name: humidity
elements.title: Humidity
elements.description: choose the one with highest humidity.

elements.name: wind_velocity
elements.title: Wind Velocity
elements.description: choose the one with highest wind velocity.

elements.name: traffic_flow
elements.title: Traffic Flow
elements.description: choose the one with highest traffic flow (car, people, bike...).

elements.name: greenery
elements.title: Greenery
elements.description: choose the one with most greenery.

elements.name: shading_area
elements.title: Shading Area
elements.description: choose the one with largest shading area.

elements.name: construction_material_comfort
elements.title: Construction Material Comfort
elements.description: choose the one with most comfortable construction material (plant, wall, fence, window...).

pages.name: page_1760605955439
pages.title: Part 4: Streetscape Design Perception
pages.description: Please choose the image in which you think to showcase the following design quality features most, there are five design quality features in this section.

elements.name: design_intro
elements.title: Among the provided street view images, which place do you perceive to showcase the following design quality features most?
elements.description: There are five streetscape design quality features in total, and you need to pick one image for each design quality feature.

elements.name: impressive
elements.title: Impressive
elements.description: choose the most impressive one.

elements.name: enclosure
elements.title: Enclosure
elements.description: choose the most enclosed one.

elements.name: human_friendly
elements.title: Human-friendly
elements.description: choose the most human-friendly one.

elements.name: transparency
elements.title: Transparency
elements.description: choose the most transparent one.

elements.name: complexity
elements.title: Complexity
elements.description: choose the most complex one.

pages.name: page_1760605955440
pages.title: Part 5: Streetscape Emotion Perception
pages.description: Please choose the image in which you think to make people have following emotions most, there are six emotional types in this section.

elements.name: emotion_intro
elements.title: Among the provided street view images, which place do you perceive to have following emotions most?
elements.description: There are six emotion types in total, and you need to pick one image for each emotion type.

elements.name: safe
elements.title: Safe
elements.description: choose the most safe one.

elements.name: lively
elements.title: Lively
elements.description: choose the most lively one.

elements.name: beautiful
elements.title: Beautiful
elements.description: choose the most beautiful one.

elements.name: wealthy
elements.title: Wealthy
elements.description: choose the most wealthy one.

elements.name: boring
elements.title: Boring
elements.description: choose the most boring one.

elements.name: depressing
elements.title: Depressing
elements.description: choose the most depressing one.
